email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 85,000 MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV SEA HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m.

Our starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per metric ton. The vessel is available for loading from October 20 to October 25.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider revising it to USD 17.50 per MT? Also, can you confirm the laycan remains as October 20-25?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 17.75 per MT. The laycan remains unchanged at October 20-25.

Please let us know if this revised rate is acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can accept the rate of USD 17.75 per MT. Could you please provide details on the demurrage rate and the vessel's performance history?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage and Vessel Details for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your acceptance. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if there is a delay beyond the agreed laydays. MV SEA HORIZON has an excellent performance record, with no reported issues in the past 12 months.

If everything is in order, we can proceed with the contract. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation for Iron Ore Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Everything looks good. We confirm the rate of USD 17.75 per MT and the demurrage terms. Please proceed with the contract and send over the necessary documentation.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
John Doe
